auth/setPassword.PasswordAndConfirmationAreNotEqual: Password and confirmation are not equal!
auth/setPassword.PasswordLengthMustBe: Password length must be at least 8 and at most 24 symbols.
auth/setPassword.InCaseYouLostYourPassword: In case you lost your password, you lost all your data. It is NOT possible to access your account without a password and there is no forgot my password option here. Do not forget it.
auth/setPassword.WeWillUseThisPassword: We will use this password as a key for encrypting your private key.
auth/setPassword.WeStoreYourPrivateKeys:
We store your private keys encrypted and
in same format as ethereum node

auth/setAccount.ForTokenTransfers: For token transfers, you need to add your Private Key for address, that holds PRIX
auth/setAccount.transferToThem: transfer to them limited amount of PRIX and ETH
auth/setAccount.useThisSeparateAccount: use this separate account in this application
auth/setAccount.PleaseChooseTheWay: Please choose the way you want to import Ethereum account
auth/setAccount.ImportKeyInHex: Import a Private Key in hex format

auth/generateKey.Name: Name
auth/generateKey.WhileNextButton: While next button will be pressed, we will generate a new account.
auth/generateKey.IfYouLoseThePassword: If you lose the password you use to encrypt your account, you will not be able to access that account

auth/importJsonKey.PasswordWillBeUsed: Password (will be used to decrypt JSON)
auth/importJsonKey.MoreInformation: More information about Ethereum Private Key

auth/importHexKey.PleaseInputHexRepresentation: Please, input hex representation of your Private Key for address, that holds PRIX
auth/importHexKey.PrivateKeyMustHave: Private key must have exactly 64 hex symbols.

auth/backup.generateKey: new key has been successfully generated and registered!
auth/backup.importHexKey: hex key has been successfully imported and registered!
auth/backup.importJsonKey: JSON Keystore File has been successfully imported!
auth/backup.PleaseBackupYourAccount: Please backup your account before start working.
auth/backup.SomeErrorOccured: Some error occured. Can't save file by specified path.
auth/backup.ToPreventEthereumAddress: To prevent Ethereum address data lost you need to backup your Private Key in a safe location as a file.
auth/backup.NoteWeEncryptThisFile: Note: We encrypt this file using your application access password. Don't forget it!

offerings/createOffering.Name: Name
offerings/createOffering.MaximumSupplyOfServices: Maximum supply of services according to service offerings.
offerings/createOffering.ItRepresentsTheMaximum: It represents the maximum number of clients that can consume this service offering concurrently.
offerings/createOffering.MaximumPaymentLagInUnits: Maximum payment lag in units after which Agent will suspend service usage.
offerings/createOffering.UsedToCalculateMinimumDeposit: Used to calculate minimum deposit required.
offerings/createOffering.UsedToSpecifyMaximumUnits: Used to specify maximum units of service that will be supplied. Can be empty.
offerings/createOffering.MaximumTimeServiceCan: Maximum time service can be in Suspended status due to payment lag.
offerings/createOffering.AfterThisTimePeriodService: After this time period service will be terminated, if no sufficient payment was received.
offerings/createOffering.AgentWillConsider: Agent will consider that Client will not use service and stop providing it.
offerings/createOffering.ThisDepositWillBeLocked: This deposit will be locked while offering is active.
offerings/createOffering.ToReturnDeposit: To return deposit close your offering.
offerings/createOffering.UnitPriceMustBeANumber: Unit price must be a number.
offerings/createOffering.UnitPriceMustBeMoreThen0: Unit price must be more then 0.
offerings/createOffering.DepositIsGreaterThenServiceBalance: Deposit is greater than service balance. Please choose another account or top up the balance.
offerings/createOffering.NotEnoughFunds: Not enough funds for publish transaction. Please, select another account.
offerings/createOffering.MaximumUnitsMustBeEqual: Maximum units must be equal or greater then minimum units.

offerings/offeringTools.popupInfo: This operation will notify Clients that your offering is actual, improving your chances for a deal.
offerings/offeringTools.removeInfo: This operation will permanently remove offering. You will receive your deposit back. Clients will not be able to accept it anymore. Offering can be removed only, if it is inactive for {{minutes}} past minutes.
offerings/offeringTools.DeleteOfferingRequestProcessing: Your delete offering request is processing. Please wait.
offerings/offeringTools.DeleteOfferingRequestScheduled1: Your delete offering request was scheduled. After
offerings/offeringTools.DeleteOfferingRequestScheduled2: minutes the offering will be removed.
